name: The Heist (itch) (samar0)
description:
Better version - https://samar0.itch.io/the-heist-extended

If possible try downloading since the web version has several bugs that should not be present in the native executables.

WASD to move, Mouse to look around, Shift to sprint, Esc or P for pause and settings

Made by Team 2869 The Regal Eagles
